text: Shawn Andrews (born October 15, 1971) is an American actor. He is best known for his role as Kevin Pickford in the 1993 Richard Linklater film Dazed and Confused. ==Career== Andrews played the lead protagonist in Fix, being awarded Best Actor at the Brooklyn Film Festival. Andrews then appeared in Big Heart City, which was nominated for an award at the Los Angeles Film Festival. His first feature film was the cult film Dazed and Confused, where Andrews starred as the character Kevin Pickford. He went on to lead roles such as in The Small Hours and City of Ghosts. ==Personal life== Andrews was born in Littleton, Massachusetts. He plays guitar and was in a high school garage band.
